original: namaḥ trailokye vyavahāramātre sati paramarthābhimānāt tattvārthānavagāhibhiḥ sattvairvastusvabhāvavivekadvāreṇāviparyayajñānasaṃprāptaye śāstraracaneyaṃ
analyzed: namaḥ trailokye vyavahāra mātre sati paramartha abhimānāt tattva artha anavagāhibhiḥ sattvaiḥ vastu svabhāva viveka dvāreṇa aviparyaya jñāna saṃprāptaye śāstra racanā iyam
rajjau sarpa manaskāraḥ rajjum dṛṣṭvā nirarthakaḥ

original: tadaṃśān vīkṣya tatrāpi bhrāntā buddhirahāviva // Hvpv_1 (6) //
analyzed: tad aṃśān vīkṣya tatra api bhrāntā buddhiḥ ahau iva
āśritāni anyatas yāvat saṃvṛti jñāna gocaraḥ
niraṃśānām acintya tva daṇtyaḥ api avastunā samaḥ

original: bhrāntamatramataḥ prājñair na cintyaṃ paramārthataḥ // Hvpv_3 (45) //
analyzed: bhrānta matram atas prājñaiḥ na cintyam paramārthataḥ

original: bhrāntaṃ tadapya samyaktvad yathā bhanaṃ tathāsti na /

analyzed: anarthakam bhāsamānam tat sadṛśa ātmakam bhavet
sarvam eva āśritam yena vidyate sūksmabuddhinā

original: tyajet sa buddhiman suṣthurāgādyahibhayaṃ yathā // Hvpv_5 //
analyzed: tyajet sa buddhiman suṣthu rāga ādi ahi bhayam yathā
laukika artha vicareṣu loka siddhim anuvrajet

original: kleśan sarvasaṃ tyaktumana yateta paramārthataḥ // Hvpv_6 //
